summary: Add a pretty kitchen, cozy furnitures, and some functional equipments to Secerin ManorAlso change the dungeon-like BGM to the Solstheim's general music.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#fce5cd][size=5]Make Severin Manor more comfortable[/size][/color]
[/font][size=3]
[/size][size=3]This mod add a pretty kitchen, cozy furnitures, and some functional equipments.
All added objects are fixed solidly, so can endure even to the shock of Kyne's Peace shout.
This also change dungeon-like BGM to Solstheim's general music.
Required:  Hearthfire and Dragonborn DLC.
[size=3][b][color=#e06666]*Notice: this mod is merged into [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88079]"Severin Manor is Your Own Home"[/url] please see it too.[/color][/b]

[b]Equipments[/b]
[b] [/b][u]Oven[/u]
  In addition to HF's recipes, can make "Boiled Cream Treat".

[b] [/b][u]Brewing Barrel[/u]
  Can make some drinks, also include a new recipe.

[b] [/b][u]Churn[/u]
  Can make butter from jug of milk. 

[b] [/b][u]Wood Chopping Block[/u]
  No more Fus Ro Dah to the miner outside.

[b] [/b][u]Storages[/u]
  1 Sack, 3 Barrels, all no-respawn

[b][color=#a4c2f4]Cofirmed compatibility (within my personal usage) [/color][/b][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Fully works with my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74167/?]"Severin Manor Bathroom"[/url], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87481?]"Severin Manor Crafting Room"[/url][/size]
[*][size=3]Well works with Jokerine's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47751/?]"Severin Manor -Garden in Basement"[/url][/size]
[*][size=3]also works with uglydemon's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31167/?]"Severin Manor Improvements"[/url][/size]
[/list]     Load order;Others:faster > Kitchen > Bathroom:last[/size]
     (In combination of "bathroom" and normal version of "Improvements", one manequin will gaze bathing...)
author: Pumpkin Pie
